description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin databases.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database create
commands.summary: Create an Gremlin database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database delete
commands.summary: Delete the Gremlin database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database exists
commands.summary: Checks if an Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin database exists.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database list
commands.summary: List the Gremlin databases under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database restore
commands.summary: Restore a deleted gremlin database within the same account.
examples: az cosmosdb gremlin database restore --resource-group resource_group --account-name database_account_name --name name_of_database_needs_to_be_restored --restore-timestamp 2020-07-13T16:03:41+0000

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database restore
commands.summary: Restore a deleted gremlin database within the same account.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb gremlin database restore --account-name
                                     --name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--disable-ttl {false, true}]
                                     [--restore-timestamp]
examples: az cosmosdb gremlin database restore --resource-group resource_group --account-name database_account_name --name name_of_database_needs_to_be_restored --restore-timestamp 2020-07-13T16:03:41+0000

commands.name: az cosmosdb gremlin database show
commands.summary: Show the details of a Gremlin database under an Azure Cosmos DB account.
